    • verify

      public boolean verify​(com.nimbusds.jose.JWSHeader header, byte[] signingInput, com.nimbusds.jose.util.Base64URL signature) throws com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException
      verification algorithm for a JWS with Hashtree ECDSA SHA256 signature
      Specified by:
      verify in interface com.nimbusds.jose.JWSVerifier
      Parameters:
      header - Header of the JWS
      signingInput - the JWS "signing input", containing Header and Payload encoded as Base64URL in Header.Payload format, as byte data
      signature - Base64URL encrypted Signature part of the JWS
      Returns:
      true if verification successful
      Throws:
      com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException - if anything goes wrong during verification (see error messages)
